description: Once you link the skill to a Bean Jar account, then you can start tracking reward points for members of your family.  Add points, remove points, report how many points each person has, and more. More details at beanjar.net
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell Bean Jar to add ten points to Gryffindor
Alexa, tell Bean Jar to take away 5 points from Amanda
Alexa, ask Bean Jar how many points does Jimmy have?
imageAltText: Bean Jar - family rewards system icon
name: Bean Jar - family rewards system
shortDescription: Manage a family or group rewards system, keeps track of points like a virtual "bean jar" for motivation.  See beanjar.net
